WorkItem.Description:
If we're assuming that bosses can parry haste, therefore expertise provides mitigation, then the reverse should also be true.  
If we parry a boss attack, it should provide parry haste to our white damage attacks and thus provide a touch more DPS -> Threat.
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Parry does not provide any Threat.

Comments.Message: Note - This doesn't doesn't apply to Rune Strike wish should be showing Dodge/Parry both having threat values since it's required to trigger a RS.  But that will only get fixed in the rotation changes that I have planned.  So that's part of a different defect.
